Name: Ancient India
comment: Coordinates for capital city of Pataliputra (modern Patna)

Name: Batak
comment: Probably more general than Toba Batak (Ib4, xd753) but there should be overlap between them

Name: Seneca
comment: Probably match to Seneca, based on references (Morgan 1901, Noon 1949)

Name: Mala
comment: Probably more general than Kwaio (Ig18, xd850) but there should be overlap between them

Name: Guaraní
comment: Guaraní in Paraguay, but not clear wheter closer to Paraguayan Guaraní (para1311) or Mbyá Guaraní (mbya1239)

Name: Chippewa
comment: Coordinates from glottolog chip1241, cross-id to Minnesota Ojibwa (EA Na36)

Name: Tasmanians
comment: Not specified whether "Northwestern (xd783)" or "Southeastern (xd980)", but matched to EA - Tasmanians (Id8) (xd783)
